price: to Whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and earth, and Allah is Witness over all things.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
